title: State v. Chester Hollman III – Addendum 1 – Advocate
description:
February 8, 2018 / Addendum host Jon Cryer, along with Colin Miller, Rabia Chaudry, and guest panelist Celeste Trusty talk about the criminal justice system in Philly as well as the Hollman case. 

You can follow the Celeste on Facebook and Twitter @thejuryroomblog. 

Today’s addendum is brought to you by Hims and Empty Frames.

Get a trial month for only $5 while supplies last. All you have to do is go to www.ForHims.com/Undisclosed. 

Empty Frames – a new investigative podcast. Search and subscribe today on Apple Podcasts or your favorite listening destination.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

#undisclosed #udaddendum #chesterhollman
